body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Michael Carter and I'm a customer service representative at Speedy Auto Sales. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Kayla Brown.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kayla. Can I have your contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's nine eight seven six five four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I have your email address, Kayla?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Kayla. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad about a billing issue I had with my recent purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Kayla. I will do my best to help resolve the issue for you. Thank you for sharing that with me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out to us, Kayla. We appreciate your time. Have a great day.
